title: "Plotting FIPS and Variables"
author: "Isabel Lopez"
date: "9/7/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r define_target_parameters}

all_data <- readRDS(file = here("data","all_data.RDS"))

```

```{r color_line_graphs}

filter(all_data, area_fips == "01003" & industry_code=="SIC_0E") %>% 
ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(year,qtrly_estabs_count, color = source))

```
